text: the spa the room with a balcony view was great. breakfast needs more vegetarian vegan options that aren t just bread and cereals pancakes tofu scrambled eggs soy yogurt etc
A lot of choice for vegans and vegetarians at breakfast and dinner staff was very friendly and nice. Room service could be improved the spa was small and sometimes noisy

Authentic Parisian style with excellent international finish and quality of service Fantastic quiet compact rooms we stayed on 6th floor. Wifi speed is low breakfast choice is limited nogo for vegan or vegetarian
The hotel staff is helpful. Limited choice of breakfast for vegetarians and vegans Rooms are very small compared to the pics also the hotel gave us a twin beds despite us requesting for double bed

The location is superb close to Central and all shopping areas as well as restaurants Our room was good size very comfy Excellent breakfast with big variety vegetarian and vegan options and bubbly. We had no ventilation in bathroom
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices

Very good hotel at a very reasonable price I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this hotel Very friendly and helpful staff wonderful sauna and fitness area great location delicious breakfast relatively good selection of vegan options for breakfast
view of the houses of parliament and the river. breakfast hot buffet was poor not a good selection and nearly cold Not able to get a vegan breakfast of merit

The room facilities were excellent and the bed was very comfortable Great shower Very clean Staff very helpful and friendly. No view from window Expected better bread selection from a hotel in Vienna Vegan options limited

Accommodated our vegetarian dietary requirements well at dinner Friendly staff. Room very hot at night and unable to leave windows open due to unpleasant odours from drainage system to rear of building No real vegetarian breakfast option

A nice location easy walking distance to metro bars restaurants Notre Dame and Jardins Luxembourg Safe provided Room size OK Nice artwork decorations. Limited vegan choice for breakfast no milk alternatives and no fresh fruit
Good selection at breakfast for vegetarians Very comfortable bed and spacious room with opening windows
Very friendly reception staff Breakfast had a good selection being a vegetarian this isnt always the case
Excellent service and a breakfast buffet with plenty of choice for a vegetarian Well designed clean rooms
Very friendly Staff Overall Comfort is good. Breakfast needs more Spread Vegetarians have no choice Only Breads and Corn flakes
Most friendly staff we ve ever met at an hotel Very helpful. Better vegetarian selection of food

The room was clean and well laid out The bathroom was good. The breakfast was poor especially for a vegetarian Little choice of eggs and no alternative to meats Too few staff at breakfast to replenish foods and coffee Awful toaster

Room was really big Reception open 24h Personel speak english Breakfast nice enough choice even soya milk for vegan. Neighborhood is bad On the left and right side are huge old empty buldings it looks terrible Little bit too far from subway station
Great breakfast amazing spa facilities good transport links. Not a lot of choice for vegetarians in the restaurants for lunch and dinner
Great comfortable rooms Excellent Service Lounge service is good Had nice time. Vegetarian options are limited request you to add more options
